text: TG Norba 24 is an Italian television channel. It is a 24-hour channel that only shows news. The channel is owned by Gruppo Norba. The channel's format shows rolling news bulletins. These are updated every 15 minutes. It broadcasts live from 5am to midnight. ==Presenters== *Enza Calitri *Maria Liuzzi *Annamaria Rosato *Grazia Rongo *Chiara Chiriatti *Donatella Azzone *Alessandro Miglietta *David V. Messina *Antonio Maiellaro *Antonio Procacci *Antonio Lorusso *Matteo Spada *Alessio Casulli *Michele Frallonardo *Daniela Mazzacane *Claudia Carbonara *Gianvito Magistà *Maurizio Marangelli *Azzurra De Razza *Francesca Rodolfo == Programming == * Buon Pomeriggio * TG Norba 24 Mattina * TG Norba 24 Flash * TG Norba 24 Pomeriggio * TG Norba 24 Sera * TG Norba 24 Lis * TG Norba 24 Prima * TG Norba 24 Sport * TG Norba 24 Rassegna Stampa * Meteo Telenorba * Il Meteo * Doctor TG24 * Il Fatto with Enzo Magistà * Il Tempo della fede * Pillole I Colori della Nostra Terra * Il Graffio' * TG Norba 24 Buongiorno * Astrabilia Category:Television channels in Italy Category:2010 establishments in Italy
title: TG Norba 24
